Uses of Package
io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.common

Packages that use io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.common
Package
Description
io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api
Facade interfaces for the core framework
io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.client
Interfaces for client-side functionality
io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.common
Interfaces and data structures that are shared for client- and server-side
io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.exceptions
Exception classes
io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.server
Interfaces for server-side resource rendering
io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.spi
SPI interfaces for HTTP transfer, exception handling and extension the annotation support for HAL API interfaces
  • Classes in io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.common used by io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api
    Class
    Description
    HalResponse
    A response to a successful or failed HTTP request to retrieve a HalResource
    RequestMetricsCollector
    Keeps track of all upstream resource that have been fetched while handling the current request, and collects additional data for performance analyze and caching.
    RequestMetricsStopwatch
    Represents an ongoing measurement of execution time that was started with Rhyme.startStopwatch(Class, Supplier) or startStopwatch(Class, Supplier), and needs to be closed to finish the measurement.
  • Classes in io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.common used by io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.client

    Description

    Keeps track of all upstream resource that have been fetched while handling the current request, and collects additional data for performance analyze and caching.
